name: Bounded (Dynamic Studios)
description:
Bounded delivers amazing co-op experience in a minimalist way, as it is design to! You, a small cube try to survive multiple waves of zombies!

Please Note

As mentioned above the game delivers a wonderful CO-OP experience. Though you can play the game alone, the game still requires you to use a PS4/PS3, XBOX ONE/XBOX 360 or any other type of controller to play. Please excuse as but we are currently working on a keyboard version of the game.

At the moment the game supports up to two players working on four players!
